short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove clutter from online articles to help your students focus on reading, and share to Google Classroom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You want students to read more online articles, yet all of the clutter and ads on some sites can be too distracting for your students.

Refine is a free Chrome extension that lets teachers share a refined online article with their students right through Google Classroom.

A simple solution brought to you by the teachers at InsertLearning.
